Burundi rebel group kills nine in overnight attack - governmentGunmen from the Red Tabara rebel group killed nine people and injured others in an overnight attack in western Burundi near the border with Democratic Republic of Congo, a government spokesperson told reporters on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:48:38 GMT QYVSSTJ5IJNURETO5BHI4TOBOA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/burundi-rebel-group-kills-9-overnight-attack-government-2024-02-26/Reuters世界非洲
Ukraine's Zelenskiy urges 'fight' for Crimea after 10 years of occupationUkraine and its international partners must continue fighting to restore Ukrainian control over Crimea, President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Monday as Kyiv marked a decade of Russian occupation of the Black Sea peninsula. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:36:44 GMT EHXZN2JQH5OVVMKRKCOX5T4XYY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-urges-fight-crimea-after-10-years-occupation-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
US airman dies after setting himself on fire outside Israeli embassy, reports sayA U.S. military service member who had set himself on fire outside the Israeli Embassy in Washington over the weekend, in an apparent act of protest against the war in Gaza, has died, local media reported on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:34:33 GMT B2FK6PMXWRIOPAICOPBSPUHBPY https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-airman-dies-after-setting-himself-fire-outside-israeli-embassy-reports-say-2024-02-26/Reuters世界美国
Slovak PM says some Western states consider bilateral deals to send troops to UkraineSeveral NATO and European Union members are considering sending soldiers to Ukraine on a bilateral basis, Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico said on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:25:24 GMT LGK7XDJF7FJTBB5X7LHWTEHNL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/slovak-pm-says-some-western-states-consider-bilingual-deals-send-troops-ukraine-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Bird-feed loaf and a date wrapped in gauze: What children eat in GazaAfter surviving on bitter loaves made from animal feed instead of proper flour, three young brothers who fled their home in Gaza City for a tent further south were tucking into a tub of halawa, a sweet crumbly paste. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:24:17 GMT DWYAAYK6LROJ3KG4HOHDU6FGII https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/bird-feed-loaf-date-wrapped-gauze-what-c​​hildren-eat-gaza-2024-02-26/Doaa Rouqa世界中东
China's latest Long March rocket to debut in year of record missionsChina's Long March 12, capable of sending bigger satellites with more functionalities into the Earth's orbit, is expected to make its debut flight in 2024, in a year of record launch missions for the country, state media reported on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:23:29 GMT LOGL6JGRJVL5TOJ7IA5TZVDFSM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-latest-long-march-rocket-debut-year-record-missions-2024-02-26/Reuters世界中国
Russian prosecutor requests life sentence for 'Volga Maniac' serial killer - TASSA prosecutor in Kazan in southwest Russia has demanded a life sentence for a serial killer known as the 'Volga Maniac,' who is accused of murdering at least 31 elderly women, the TASS state media agency reported on Monday, citing a correspondent in the courtroom. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:20:00 GMT FZV2JRIDIBK3NBRDTVQOEZAYTU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-prosecutor-requests-life-sentence-volga-maniac-serial-killer-tass-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Spain's Seville plans to charge fee for visiting landmark squareTourists visiting the southern Spanish city of Seville may soon have to pay a fee to explore the wide, ornate Plaza de Espana square, the city hall said, as part of plans to control tourist overload in a public open space. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 13:15:40 GMT EBMJCH3MQJKHXPPDP4UQRGTC2M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/spains-seville-plans-charge-fee-visiting-landmark-square-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Lockbit cybercrime gang says it is back online following global police bustLockbit, the cybercrime gang that was knocked offline by a comprehensive international police operation earlier this month, says it has restored its servers and is back in business. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 12:52:57 GMT 4HZ4IPHEFFNV5GMRAUN6R4BJXM https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/lockbit-cybercrime-gang-says-it-is-back-online-following-global-police-bust-2024-02-26/James Pearson技术网络安全
Uzbek court sentences 23 over contaminated cough syrup deathsA court in Uzbekistan sentenced 23 people to prison terms on Monday over the deaths of 68 children linked to contaminated cough syrups produced by India's Marion Biotech, following a six-month-long trial. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 12:46:31 GMT OU6G6HTHPRLKHERCOBRJHTOKIY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/uzbek-court-sentences-23-over-contamerated-cough-syrup-deaths-2024-02-26/Reuters世界亚太地区
Polish farmers block highway at border crossing with GermanyPolish farmers protesting against European Union regulations and cheap food imports from Ukraine blocked the A2 highway at a border crossing with Germany on Monday. Mon, 26 Feb 2024 12:30:37 GMT MMORBFKMDJLJZDPKTKNJZ5WL3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-farmers-block-highway-border-crossing-with-germany-2024-02-26/Reuters世界欧洲
